ygData.subject: Fear oddity.
ygData.msgSnippet: I was fighting HG s in Rathe mountains last night and noticed some interesting things about the new fear and charm messages. The message that tells you that
ygData.messageBody:
I was fighting HG's in Rathe mountains last night
and noticed
some interesting things about the new fear and
charm messages.
The message that tells you that charm has worn of
seems to work
very well. Yay! This is a very nice addition.
The same message
for fear seem to work most of the time, but there
were also MANY
times when I got the message, "Hill Giant flees in
terror." And the
giant stood there and whacked on me...no message
about the giant
breaking fear, or anything. Interestingly, this
seemed to happen
a LOT after the giant had been charmed, like it
was so pissed at
me it was unafraid (despite the message to the
contrary). In any
case, I /petitioned it and they said they filed it
as a bug. So if
you see this happening, be sure to /petition it (I
think /bug is useless).

Laluni Songhammer, Level 33 bard of E'Ci

--
Steven S. Klug
sklug@...
